bwwExcerpt: And that's not even including "Bad Girl" and "No More Tears" ("Enough is Enough"); enough, when it comes to Summer, never really being enough. Not for we longtime fans, anyway. And unless you are in the parody business, you then need the actual life-story of the singer to have a structure on which to hang all of those songs, being as they express simple feelings, not complex narratives.
